Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2016 11:51PM Fowlertee wrote: Hi..I'm new to this thread. .as of today I went from a clinical stage IIa after lumpectomy to remove a 2.5cm tumor(10/13/15) to IIIa after BMX (1/20/16) discovered 5.4cm tumor and 1 node. oh and her2+. I've got a 5yro and 8yro...and I'm freaking out! I will say..you ladies are getting me through the day..thank you!! Since getting the orginal dx 10/16..I have shed about a mins worth of tears. .and now I'm barely keeping it together after today's call. I'm pretty strong but am finding hard to find my strength just now. Anyway..thank you all for your strength and positive stories ...you've really helped me today. Tomorrow is a new day!
Posts.Title: Recently diagnosed and afraid Kdettwiller kim40
